body_html:
Hi @suchetasu , as @concretevitamin mentioned, it looks like you're exceeding the max tensor size implemented by the BiasAdd op's gradient. Unfortunately there is no simple solution, you'll either need to change your model to avoid this limitation or we'll need to find someone to modify BiasAddGrad (probably a non-trivial change).

If you share more information as suggested in the template, especially a minimal repro, that will help us find a more specific solution.

body:
Hi @suchetasu , as @concretevitamin mentioned, it looks like you're exceeding the max tensor size implemented by the BiasAdd op's gradient. Unfortunately there is no simple solution, you'll either need to change your model to avoid this limitation or we'll need to find someone to modify BiasAddGrad (probably a non-trivial change).

If you share more information as suggested in the template, especially a minimal repro, that will help us find a more specific solution.
